1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Natalie D'Angelo (Janine Anzalone) gets the opportunity of her career to audition for Hollywood director, Stephen Day. She quickly learns that there's more to lose than just her big break.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Natalie's New York City boyfriend, Gregory Chase, (Jesse Malinowski) gets an offer he can't refuse, but will it mean Natalie is left to fend for herself?

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Natalie takes out her resentment for her father on her long-distance boyfriend, Gregory, while Gram, (Dandy Barrett) tries to deny she has a slight drinking problem as noted by the Green Cove Springs Police Department.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Natalie falls into the abyss of an Absinthe trip trying to impress director, Stephen Day, played by Kevin Porter (Dodgeball). Playing his game becomes a more wild ride than she bargained for.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Natalie gets a surprise visit from Gregory that turns out to be a real slap in the face.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: As sparks fly between Natalie and Tyler, is Gregory too late or will he able to reel her back in?

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: When Natalie tries to reconnect with Gregory, she discovers the real reason he came to Florida. Meanwhile, Amy confronts Stephen Day and finds more than she bargained for and Tyler has his own plans for Natalie.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Natalie is forced to face her father when secrets of the past get exposed in this riveting season finale.

imdb.plot outline: Up and coming actress Natalie D'Angelo (Janine Anzalone) leaves the riches of her high powered New York City lawyer father, Richard D'Angelo (Kent Lindsey) to find her way to Hollywood through Jacksonville Florida. After not having much success as an actress in NYC, Natalie hears about the film industry starting to take root again in the place once called "Hollywood East," Jacksonville, FL. So she moves south and back in with her old college roommate and fellow actor friend, Kansas Bryan (Joanna C. Horton). Natalie is ready for a shot of being cast in a Hollywood blockbuster movie being filmed in Jacksonville and directed by the hottest director in Hollywood, Stephen Day (Kevin Porter). Casting Director Amy Rollins (Cindy Hogan) inadvertently puts Natalie in a compromising situation with the powerful and devious Stephen Day. As if Natalie didn't have enough to deal with concerning a manipulative director, she soon learns that her so called best friend, Kansas, has used her for her own personal gain for the spotlight and ticket to Hollywood. Staying true to her path, Natalie has to overcome her overzealous boyfriend, Gregory Chase (Jesse Malinowski) who's working secretly for her father to bring her back to the family in New York City, and her feelings for a new love interest Tyler Hurley (Mack Dalton). As the series unfolds, Natalie finds herself exposing much more than she bargained for in hopes of gaining her big break. Watch the show to see how Natalie fights to make it in a business where "Everybody's Watching".
imdb.title: Exposure
plot: Big city girl Natalie D'Angelo (Janine Anzalone) abandons the extreme competition of New York City's entertainment industry and moves to Jacksonville, Florida's sub-market in hopes of catching her big break that launches her acting career.::Janine Anzalone
